                                                Locator Resources National level Policy State level Policies Electricity Cost for charging Standards and Specifications Reports and Articles Media Useful Links Skill Centre International Best Practices on Policies Template for State Level EV Awareness portal Support FAQs Share Your Content Crude Oil Savings Calculator According to the Oil Ministry data, “India paid $82.4 billion for the crude oil it imported in the nine months through December 2021, a 108% jump over $39.6 billion paid over the same period in 2020”. Our Lifestyle choices, from transportation to diet, impact the nation.

                        Crude Oil Savings Calculator helps in calculating the savings in the consumption of crude oil if a person switches from a conventional Vehicle to an EV. Should I shift to electric vehicle? Vehicle Segment Select 2W (Two-Wheeler) 3W (Three-Wheeler) 4W (Four-Wheeler) Comparing Vehicle Fuel Type Select PETROL Distance km Enter
                                                    valid numeric value only Frequency Select Daily Weekly Monthly Annual Distance km Average Vehicle Mileage km/L Enter
                                                    valid numeric value only Lifecycle of the Vehicle years Enter
                                                    valid numeric value only Calculate Total
